Detailed Description

BtDeviceListNode forms the central class for building up the BtDeviceList. It contains all link variables for a double linked list and memory for holding one BtDevice. It is a private class because it is used by BtDeviceList internally and the application programmer has not to mess around with this class.

Member Function Documentation

const BtDevice & BtDeviceList::BtDeviceListNode::GetDevice (   )  const
 

Get the device stored in this element.

GetDevice returns a reference to the element that is managed by this node. It should not be possible to change the contained BtDevice, so a constant reference, is returned by this operation.

Returns:
A reference to a BtDevice containing the element managd by this node.

BtDevice & BtDeviceList::BtDeviceListNode::GetDevice (   ) 
 

Get the element stored in this node.

GetDevice returns a reference to the element that is managed by this node. It should be possible to change the contained BtDevice, so a reference, and no constant reference, is returned by this operation.

Returns:
A reference to a BtDevice containing the element managd by this node.

const BtDeviceList::BtDeviceListNode * BtDeviceList::BtDeviceListNode::GetNext (   )  const
 

Get successor.

GetNext returns the link pointer to the next node representing this nodes successor.

Returns:
BtDeviceListNode Link to the node that is the successor of this node.
0 The element is not contained in the list.

Store the passed in element in this node.

Set successor.
